H0.text: What was Truman Capote's last name before he was adopted by his stepfather. Lillie

H1.text: What was Truman Capote's last name before he was adopted by his stepfather. Faulk

H2.text: What was Truman Capote's last name before he was adopted by his stepfather. Streckfus

H3.text: What was Truman Capote's last name before he was adopted by his stepfather. Person

A4.text: Truman Capote was born at Touro Infirmary in New Orleans, Louisiana, to Lillie Mae Faulk and salesman Archulus Persons.

A5.text: Truman Garcia Capote ( kə-POH-tee; born Truman Streckfus Persons; September 30, 1924 – August 25, 1984) was an American novelist, screenwriter, playwright, and actor.
